remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]数据绑定模型使您能够将验证规则与您的 对象相关联。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model enables you to associate validation rules with your object. 在调用转换器之前从目标到源的值传输过程中进行验证。Validation occurs during target-to-source value transfer before the converter is called. 下面描述了验证过程。The following describes the validation process. 1. 当值从目标属性传输到源属性时，数据绑定引擎首先 会删除可能已添加到 绑定元素的附加属性的任何。When a value is being transferred from the target property to the source property, the data binding engine first removes any that might have been added to the attached property of the bound element. 然后，它会检查是否定义了任何自定义验证规则 ，在这种情况下，它会 在每个规则上调用方法， 直到其中一个发生故障或直到全部通过为止。It then checks whether any custom validation rules are defined for that , in which case it calls the method on each until one of them fails or until all of them pass. 2. 如果有一个没有通过的自定义规则，则绑定引擎将创建一个 对象并将其添加到 绑定元素的集合中。Once there is a custom rule that does not pass, the binding engine creates a object and adds it to the collection of the bound element. 如果 不为空，则元素的 附加属性设置为 `true`。When is not empty, the attached property of the element is set to `true`. 此外，如果 的 属性设置为 `true`，则绑定引擎将在元素上引发 附加事件。Also, if the property of the is set to `true`, then the binding engine raises the attached event on the element. 3. 如果所有规则都通过，则绑定引擎会调用转换器（如果存在）。If all the rules pass, the binding engine then calls the converter, if one exists. 4. 如果转换器通过，则绑定引擎将调用源属性的 setter。If the converter passes, the binding engine calls the setter of the source property. 5. 如果绑定具有 与之关联的，并且在步骤3或4中引发了异常，则绑定引擎会检查是否存在 。If the binding has an associated with it and an exception is thrown during step 3 or 4, the binding engine checks to see if there is an . 你可以使用 回调提供自定义处理程序来处理异常。You can use the callback to provide a custom handler for handling exceptions. 如果未在 上指定 ，则绑定引擎会创建具有异常的 并将其添加到绑定元素的 集合中。If an is not specified on the , the binding engine creates a with the exception and adds it to the collection of the bound element. (目标到源或源到目标) 方向的有效值传输将清除 附加属性。A valid value transfer in either direction (target to source or source to target) will clear the attached property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个创建的、 用于报告验证错误消息的样式触发器。The following example shows a style trigger that creates a that reports a validation error message. 附加属性返回 绑定元素上的对象的集合。The attached property returns a collection of objects on the bound element.
